title: Gulabi Bagh Kundan Kanthi Haaram - Emerald and Ruby Floral Necklace
materials: Kundan Polki Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish. Gold purity is hallmarked.
features: Exquisite floral design featuring a central ruby and kundan polki flower, alternating with emerald square cut flowers. The delicate kundan setting showcases traditional craftsmanship. Features closed setting Kundan craftsmanship with meticulous attention to detail. A nod to the Nizam era, the intricate design embodies old-world charm.
colors: White (Kundan). Classic South Indian color palette.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
and traditional ceremonies such as Seemantham or half-saree function (Pavada Dhaavani). Also suitable for upscale cultural events and heirloom jewelry collections.
description: This Kanthi Haaram is a true testament to Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The use of high-quality emeralds, rubies, and kundan polki diamonds ensures enduring beauty and value. Its timeless design makes it a versatile piece that can be passed down through generations, becoming a cherished heirloom. The rich colors and intricate detailing make it a statement piece for any special occasion.
